message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.DS

This paper discusses the challenges and potential solutions for integrating Distributed Ledger Technologies (DLTs) with Internet-of-Things (IoT) devices. As such, it is likely to fall under the following arXiv CS sub-categories:

- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security): This sub-category covers research on secure communication and data protection, which are relevant to the integration of DLTs with IoT devices.
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture): This sub-category covers research on network protocols and architectures, which are relevant to the communication aspects of the integration of IoT devices with DLTs.
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing): This sub-category covers research on distributed systems and architectures, which are relevant to the decentralized trust architecture enabled by DLTs.
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): This sub-category covers research on control systems and automation, which are relevant to the management of IoT devices and their integration with DLTs.
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms): This sub-category covers research on data structures and algorithms, which are relevant to the synchronization protocols proposed in the paper.
